segments.text: I see a woman in a knee-length dress, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pours over the sink like an endless waterfall, yet she remains focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's strange how oblivious she is to the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even notices the danger right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to be in their own little world of mischief, but she should be the one watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the sunlight streaming through the window creates such a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and tidy compared to this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
